thread.title: In Transit: Royal Caribbean Cruise Ship Has Small Fire in Jamaica
thread.title_full: In Transit: Royal Caribbean Cruise Ship Has Small Fire in Jamaica

author: SHIVANI VORA
title: In Transit: Royal Caribbean Cruise Ship Has Small Fire in Jamaica
text:
Royal Caribbean Cruise Ship Has Small Fire in Jamaica JULY 22, 2015 Freedom of the Seas is one of three Freedom-class vessels. Credit Royal Caribbean 
Advertisement Continue reading the main story Royal Caribbean said that one of its cruise ships, Freedom of the Seas, had experienced a brief fire on Wednesday morning as it was pulling into the port of Falmouth, Jamaica. The company said the fire, which took place in a mechanical room, had been rapidly contained and extinguished. There were no casualties among the 4,454 passengers aboard, according to the Miami-based company, and one crew member was treated for minor first-degree burns. The cause of the fire is still under investigation. Passengers were called to assemble at their muster stations “in an abundance of caution,” the company said, but did not have to board the lifeboats.
